issues.title: Add setReadOnly(String ...) to ConnectionImpl

move http://wiki.apache.org/solr/SolJSON ('JSON specific parameters' +) to Solr Ref Guide
/export should support other formats
Refactor responsewriter to remove dependencies on TupleStream etc
Create a javabin parser for streaming end point
expand json.nl test+docs coverage w.r.t. NamedList(null=null)
Refactor CloudSolrClient to eliminate direct dependency on ZK
It may be possible for temporary files to accumulator until the Solr process is shut down
Request for core status during core reload causes 500 error due to IndexWriter AlreadyClosedException
Performance issue when using group.facet=true
Faceting on a field in SolrCloud with docValues=true and indexed=false fails
Make grouping code use response builder needDocList
UpdateLog can miss closing transaction log objects.
Unexpected docvalues type NUMERIC when grouping by a int facet
In files example, update-script.js scripting URP fails with method signature mismatch
Config API does not work when adding a component with DirectSolrSpellChecker
Export handler returns zero for numeric fields that are not in the original doc
The HDFS BlockDirectoryCache should not let it's keysToRelease or names maps grow indefinitely.
Solr script not properly checking SOLR_PID

AIOBE with confusing message for incomplete sort spec in Streaming Expression
NPE in Replica Placement Rules when using Overseer Role with other rules

Change hard-coded keysize from 512 to 1024
Solr throws exception when expand=true on empty result
{!join score=.. fromIndex=..} throws "undefined field" for numeric field if from and to schemas are different
Admin UI (new) query panel does not render csv format
Admin UI (new) does not include highlighting indicating match in Analysis View

NPE in export handler when "fl" parameter is omitted.
NPE in export handler when "fl" parameter is omitted.
DeleteByQuery forward requests to down replicas and set it in LiR

solr.in.sh properties does not set need/want client auth values.
wt=javabin support at /export
HttpSolrCall always prefer leader
JavabinCodec to Implement PushWriter interface
Parameter substitution (MacroExpander) Map expand issue
PreAnalyzedField can cause managed schema corruption
solr.cmd on Windows requires modify permissions in the current directory

Resolv Variables in DIH when using encryptKeyFile.
FieldSortValues should reuse comparator and only invalidate leafComparator
CoreContainer incorrectly setting MDCLoggingContext for core
Schema modifications are not immediately visible on the coordinating node
A variety of spots in the code can create a collection zk node after the collection has been removed.
Deadlock on ManagedIndexSchema lock.
replication.properties cannot be updated after being written and neither replication.properties or index.properties are durable in the face of a crash
Function result is compared with itself
Code smell in if statement
example solr config files can lead to invalid tlog replays when using add-unknown-fields-to-schema updat chain
Add ability to turn off/on caches
EasyMock/Mockito no longer works with Java 9 b148+

PeerSync alreadyInSync check is not backwards compatible

random Streaming Expression is not registered in /stream or /graph handler

hll omits value in distributed mode when no values in field
TestRecovery.testBuffering() failure
FileAlreadyExistsException on replication.properties

Integrate Learning to Rank into Solr
Add priority Streaming Expression
Expose UnifiedHighlighter in Solr
Use metrics-jvm library to instrument jvm internals
Add NullStream to isolate the performance of the ExportWriter
index size unavailable in gui/mbeans unless replication handler configured
Improve Solr metrics reporting

Faster method for group.facet
Allow optional leading wildcards in complexphrase
Add HavingStream to Streaming API and StreamingExpressions
Use Metrics library for core metrics

Solrj client support for hierarchical clusters and other topics marker
Support Secure Impersonation / Proxy User for solr authentication
Add json.nl=arrnvp (array of NamedValuePair) style in JSONResponseWriter
Introduce a generic authentication plugin which delegates all functionality to Hadoop authentication framework
Remove several guava, apache commons calls in favor of java 8 alternatives
Limit FastLRUCache by RAM Usage
Add support for javabin for /stream, /sql internode communication

Support cursor paging in SolrEntityProcessor
add filter to any facet
Ability to specify a query with a parameter name (in facet filter)
Optimize blockChildren facets with filter specified
Saner default for maxWarmingSearchers
Allow Variables for All Data Import Handler Data Source Configuration Values
Ability to specify Key Store type in solr.in.sh file for SSL
JDBCStream improvements

Defer creation of clauses in parser, optionally delegate groups to FieldType.getSetQuery

Implement move in HdfsDirectoryFactory.

refactor preferLocalShards implementation
